description: This file defines a script that creates an AI agent capable of generating images using DALL-E, and runs a sample image creation request, streaming intermediate steps and printing the output.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of executing tasks with specified tools and models.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Represents the response from running an agent, possibly including intermediate steps.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Method of Agent class to execute a task with options for streaming responses and intermediate steps.
